message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it's a great deal and will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $140.  How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $145 for it.
